attributes.action: Major reforms in not only sentencing but also the rights given to child sex non sexual abusers and abductors and murders
attributes.additional_details:
This is an e-petition in order for major reforms to be made to the way in which all child related offences are charged sentenced and the rights in which these people who commit any child related crime are allowed to live and be protected  please sign let at least get the views heard
We need change for the safety of our children
